tool.name: xmsannotator - simple
tool.command: Rscript -e 'annotation <- xmsannotator::simple_annotation( peaks = arrow::read_feather("$peaks"), adducts = rhdf5::h5read("$adducts", "adducts"), metabolites = rhdf5::h5read("$metabolites", "metabolites"), mz_tolerance = as.double($mass_tolerance) )' -e 'arrow::write_feather(annotation, "$annotation")'

param.name: mass_tolerance
param.label: Mass tolerance [ppm]
param.help: Mass tolerance in ppm for database matching.
